products.name: Solvy Floor cleaner
products.shortDescription: High-performance deodorizing floor cleaner for daily maintenance in hotels, hospitals, offices and homes.
products.description: SOLVY Floor Cleaner is a professional-grade formulation designed for daily cleaning of vitrified tiles, marble, granite and other hard floor surfaces. It offers excellent soil removal, streak-free finish and a fresh fragrance, making it ideal for high-traffic areas such as lobbies, corridors, patient rooms and reception spaces.
features: Streak-free cleaning with fresh deodorizing fragrance
Effective on vitrified tiles, marble, granite and ceramic flooring
Low-foaming for mop and machine applications
Suitable for hotels, hospitals, offices and residential complexes

seo.metaTitle: Industrial Floor Cleaner Manufacturer in India | SOLVY
seo.metaDescription: SOLVY Floor Cleaner is a high-performance industrial floor cleaner for hotels, hospitals, offices and homes. Streak-free finish and fresh fragrance for professional housekeeping.

products.name: Solvy Kitchen Cleaner
products.shortDescription: Heavy-duty kitchen degreaser for food preparation areas and commercial kitchens.
products.description: SOLVY Kitchen Cleaner is a powerful degreasing formulation for cutting through oil, grease and food deposits on kitchen surfaces. It is suitable for stainless steel worktops, tiles, hoods, counters and food preparation areas in hotels, restaurants, cloud kitchens and institutional canteens.
features: Heavy-duty degreasing action for tough kitchen soil
Safe for stainless steel, tiles and most washable surfaces
Helps maintain hygiene in high-usage commercial kitchens
Optimised for housekeeping and stewarding teams

seo.metaDescription: SOLVY Kitchen Cleaner is a heavy-duty degreaser for commercial and hotel kitchens. Effectively removes oil and grease from tiles, counters and stainless steel surfaces.

products.name: Solvy Glass Cleaner
products.shortDescription: Streak-free glass and mirror cleaner for clear, spot-free surfaces.
products.description: SOLVY Glass Cleaner delivers crystal-clear, streak-free cleaning for glass, mirrors, windows and glossy surfaces. It is suitable for hotels, hospitals, offices and retail environments where presentation and visibility are critical.
features: Streak-free formula for glass and mirrors
Fast-drying with no sticky residue
Ideal for lobby glass, partitions and windows
Ready-to-use convenience for housekeeping teams

seo.metaTitle: Professional Glass Cleaner Supplier in India | SOLVY
seo.metaDescription: SOLVY Glass Cleaner provides streak-free cleaning for glass, mirrors and windows in hotels, hospitals, offices and homes.

products.name: Solvy Toilet Cleaner
products.shortDescription: Thick toilet bowl cleaner for tough stains and hygienic washrooms.
products.description: SOLVY Toilet Bowl Cleaner is a thick, powerful cleaner formulated to remove hard water stains, scale and deposits from toilet bowls and urinals. It helps maintain hygienic, fresh-smelling washrooms in hotels, hospitals, offices and public facilities.
features: Thick formula clings to vertical surfaces for longer contact time
Removes hard water stains and scale deposits
Helps control malodour in washrooms
Suitable for hotels, hospitals, offices and institutions

seo.metaTitle: Toilet Bowl Cleaner Manufacturer in India | SOLVY
seo.metaDescription: SOLVY Toilet Bowl Cleaner is a thick washroom cleaning chemical for removing stains and scale from toilet bowls and urinals in hotels, hospitals and offices.

products.name: Solvy Handwash
products.shortDescription: Mild, effective liquid hand wash for frequent use in commercial and home washrooms.
products.description: SOLVY Liquid Hand Wash is a skin-friendly hand washing formulation suitable for hotels, hospitals, offices, institutions and homes. It offers effective cleansing with a pleasant fragrance, making it ideal for frequent daily use in washrooms and hand wash stations.
features: Gentle on skin for frequent hand washing
Pleasant fragrance suitable for guest-facing washrooms
Compatible with most liquid soap dispensers
Ideal for hotels, hospitals, offices and homes

seo.metaTitle: Liquid Hand Wash Manufacturer & Supplier | SOLVY
seo.metaDescription: SOLVY Liquid Hand Wash is a mild yet effective hand wash for hotels, hospitals, offices and homes. Suitable for frequent daily use.

products.name: Solvy Dishwash
products.shortDescription: Effective dishwash liquid for removing grease and food residues.
products.description: Solvy Dishwash is formulated to cut through tough grease and leave utensils sparkling clean. Suitable for both household and commercial kitchens.
features: Powerful degreasing action
Gentle on hands with rinse-off formula
Suitable for dishes, cutlery and kitchenware

seo.metaDescription: Solvy Dishwash removes grease and food residues for sparkling dishes.
